translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? #dataprotection #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it questions why companies continue to collect and sell personal data despite the importance of data protection, privacy, and security. the hashtags used in the post help to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
